objects.specification: A solid floor with smooth light-colored finish and subtle wood grain texture complementing the classroom theme. It has a flat rectangular surface covering the entire area, providing a level foundation for all furniture and decorations.

A flat ceiling panel painted in a light tone, with a smooth surface to enclose the classroom. It serves as the mounting surface for multiple hanging pendant lights that ensure bright and even illumination.

A solid front wall panel painted in a light tone, adorned with subtle dinosaur footprint decals scattered across the surface to reinforce the classroom theme. It features a smooth finish and crisp edges.

A solid back wall panel painted in a light tone, adorned with subtle dinosaur footprint decals scattered across the surface to reinforce the classroom theme. It features a smooth finish and crisp edges.

A solid left wall panel painted in a light tone, adorned with subtle dinosaur footprint decals scattered across the surface to reinforce the classroom theme. It features a smooth finish and crisp edges.

A solid right wall panel painted in a light tone, adorned with subtle dinosaur footprint decals scattered across the surface to reinforce the classroom theme. It features a smooth finish and crisp edges.
A modern rectangular window with slim frame and clear transparent glass, allowing natural daylight to enter the room. It has a minimalistic design with crisp edges and subtle sill detail.

A teacher's desk crafted from light wood texture with smooth surfaces and rounded corners, robust construction with sturdy legs and a modesty panel. It features ample tabletop space for teaching materials and an understated minimalist design.

An ergonomic teacher chair with a lightly padded seat and backrest upholstered in a vibrant complementary color, supported by sturdy legs. It has a simple modern silhouette and slightly curved armrests for comfort during lessons.

A decorative globe featuring dinosaur-themed cartography, showing ancient landmasses and dinosaur illustrations. It has a spherical shape mounted on a slender stand, with vibrant earth-tone colors and fine detail.
A large rectangular blackboard with a smooth dark matte surface framed by a narrow wooden border. It is wall-mounted and provides ample writing space for chalk, with a simple and functional design.

A rectangular student desk made of light wood grain texture, with slightly rounded edges and four straight legs. It has a modesty panel and a smooth tabletop surface sized for a single student, featuring a minimalistic modern design.

A student chair with a curved plastic seat and backrest in a vibrant complementary color, supported by a slender metal frame. The chair features a contoured seat for ergonomics and four sturdy legs, fitting neatly under the desk.

A modern pendant light fixture featuring a simple white shade with a smooth matte finish, suspended by a thin cable. Each light provides focused downward illumination with a subtle decorative accent, arranged in a grid for even lighting.

A detailed standing dinosaur skeleton model rendered in a museum-style aesthetic. It features realistic bone structure and fine detail, mounted on a subtle base and evoking a scientific display with a neutral bone color finish.

A tall rectangular display shelf crafted from light wood texture, featuring multiple tiers for displaying books and models. It has open sides and a minimalist frame, suitable for showcasing dinosaur book replicas and small models.

A framed dinosaur-themed poster showcasing vivid illustrations of dinosaurs and scientific labels, printed on high-quality matte paper. The poster has a thin decorative frame and vibrant colors that stand out against the wall.

A round wall clock with a sleek frame and clear glass cover, featuring a simple dial with bold hour markers. The clock has minimalistic hands and a contrasting finish for easy readability and complements the room's decor.
A small cylindrical waste bin with a matte finish, featuring a slightly tapered profile and durable construction. It has a smooth rim and simple design suitable for classroom disposal.

A decorative potted plant featuring lush green foliage in a simple ceramic pot. The plant has natural organic shapes with multiple leaves and a textured pot surface, adding a touch of greenery to the corner.
